description:
The destruction of Wuv-Wuv Moonbeam cannot go unpunished. The Oinky Doink Café must make amends to Maidalien — but at what cost to Nagomi and Nerula`s budding sisterhood?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Blood in a Sisterly Troth and the Menace of the Red Bat
Shimai Sakazuki ni Sosogu Chi: Aka Bat no Kyoukou
Une coupe remplie de sang. Une batte écarlate et menaçante
姉妹盃に注ぐ血 赤バットの凶行
